item.title: Learn PostgreSQL and SQL Quickly and Free
item.description: Learn PostgreSQL and SQL Quickly and Free Want to learn PostgreSQL? What if you could learn PostgreSQL without having to install the database, load data, find sample data, and it was free? PGExamples.com is what you are looking for. First, let me state that I have no connection to the website or its author. I discovered PgExercises.com by accident and was impressed by its quality and completeness. I am so impressed that I am exploring a video series on it.
